column7: When troubles come and my heart burdened be
column8: 我遇到了困难，我心绪烦扰
column10: I am still and wait here in the silence
column12: Until you come and sit awhile with me
column13: 直到你来到我身边，临我而坐
column15: so I can stand on mountains
column16: 因为你的鼓舞，我才可以征服群山
column19: 因为你的鼓舞，我才能够冒着暴雨破浪前行
column21: when I am on your shoulders
column22: 因为有你的肩膀倚靠，我才如此强大
column23: You raise me up… To more than I can be
column24: 因为你的鼓舞，我才能超越自我
